AFz.caption: Take Picture Action. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
AFz.doc: To use this plugin in the workflow section, put the photo capture action in a workflow. Specify the ID of the element you want and the quality of the photo.
AFz.name: takepicture

AGA.caption: Access To File. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
AGA.doc: To access the image file, use the state of this element.
AGA.name: accesstofile

AGB.caption: Image Taken Event  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
AGB.doc: The <Image Taken> event is triggered after the file is ready, it may be useful in some situations.
AGB.name: imageta
